article.section: 01 Istanbul cityCollect your first stamp in your Sufi Trail passport.Bahariye Mevlevihanesi Human and Civilization Movement. Murat İnkaya assistant Secretary General.Silahtarağa Cad. 12 Eyüp+90 212 5013171/+90 533 397 87 79minkaya@imh.org.trwww.imh.org.trThis route is a route through the european part of Istanbul starting at Bahariye Mevlevihane cross. This route visits all kinds of places from holy and mystical to cafetarias and restaurants.
